definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: 648:b. II. [[נכר]], 11. 5 f.: for ‘nakira in sense be bad, evil,’ etc., rd. nakura be ignorant of, Qor 11:73; II. change, alter, so as not to be known, disguise Qor 27:41; IV=I, also deny, Qor 16:85 repudiate.’

definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: — 1.9: Syriac. nakar reject is rare (twice), and Psalm prop. nakriy alienavit each time.
